info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 29 at 2:08PM CST until December 29 at 2:30PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 PM CST FOR CENTRAL BRADLEY COUNTY... At 207 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hermitage, or 13 miles southwest of Warren, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Warren... Hermitage... Hilo... Lanark... Banks... Carmel... Farmville... Gravelridge... Mt Olive in Bradley County... Jersey... Sumpter... THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for southeastern and southwestern Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
